rooms.description: A spacious entrance with Art Deco elements and a decorative archway.
An open-plan area that merges the kitchen and living space. Features modern Art Deco furniture and integrated lighting.
Adjacent to the living area with modern appliances and a functional layout. Countertops in geometric patterns.
Spacious bedroom located on the west side for Vastu benefits, with a dedicated balcony for enhanced light and air circulation.
Balcony attached to Bedroom 1 providing an outdoor retreat, adhering to open-air design principles.

openings.description: Primary entry with Art Deco-inspired detailing and energy-efficient design.
Large windows to maximize natural light from the east side.
Balanced window arrangement for ventilation and ambient lighting.
Access to the spacious balcony ensuring good cross-ventilation.
